definitions.text: a group of people who work together
an organized structure for arranging or classifying
examples: he changed the arrangement of the topics
the facts were familiar but it was in the organization of them that he was original
he tried to understand their system of classification

definitions.text: the persons (or committees or departments etc.) who make up a body for the purpose of administering something
examples: he claims that the present administration is corrupt
the governance of an association is responsible to its members
he quickly became recognized as a member of the establishment

definitions.text: the act of organizing a business or an activity related to a business
examples: he was brought in to supervise the organization of a new department

definitions.text: an ordered manner; orderliness by virtue of being methodical and well organized
examples: his compulsive organization was not an endearing quality
we can't do it unless we establish some system around here

definitions.text: the activity or result of distributing or disposing persons or things properly or methodically
examples: his organization of the work force was very efficient

definitions.text: the act of forming or establishing something
examples: the constitution of a PTA group last year
it was the establishment of his reputation
he still remembers the organization of the club
